fesenjan.instructions: Cook chicken with onions and spices. Add ground walnuts and pomegranate paste. Simmer until thickened.

ghormeh-sabzi.instructions: Fry herbs and onions. Add lamb, beans, dried lime, and spices. Simmer until meat is tender.

tahchin.instructions: Mix rice with yogurt, saffron, and eggs. Layer with cooked chicken. Bake until golden.

kebab.instructions: Mix ground meat with grated onion and spices. Shape onto skewers and grill.

ash-reshteh.instructions: Cook beans and herbs. Add noodles and fried onions. Simmer until noodles are tender.
